parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Uncontrolled engine compartment fires can cause damage to the vehicle, risk of injury or fatality to occupants, and potentially spread to surrounding objects or structures.
symptoms: Burning smell or odor inside the vehicle
smoke or fumes emanating from the vents
orange-colored fumes or smoke from the hood or engine area
sudden and unexpected fire in the engine compartment.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The erratic brake performance can cause the vehicle to lurch forward or become unstable, increasing the risk of accidents or loss of control.
symptoms: Hard brakes are felt when shifting into drive
brake pedal is stuck in a high position and cannot be compressed
excessive brake pressure is required to prevent the vehicle from moving inadvertently
grinding sound when applying brakes and releasing
grinding sound is pronounced when applying the brake and turning the steering wheel at the same time.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The brake pad/rotor stiction and vibration can lead to premature wear of brake components, reduced braking performance, and potentially cause accidents.
symptoms: Grinding sound when applying brakes and releasing
grinding sound is pronounced when applying the brake and turning the steering wheel at the same time.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The sudden and unexpected shattering of the sunroof/moonroof can cause a loud noise, distraction, and potentially lead to loss of control, accidents, or injuries from shattered glass.
symptoms: The sunroof/moonroof suddenly shatters or explodes without any apparent reason
often in the middle of nowhere.
